Content: Autume Carving: Force Anouncement
Increase all Concerto Element DMG by {0}%. Each time casting Resonance Skill, increases ATK by {1}%, heavy attack DMG by {2}%. This effect can stack 2 times and last for 10s.
Weapon
A blade born of service to the law. Ornamentation resembling the law is engraved on its body. Swear on the alliance, glory shall come!
A blade born of service to the law. Ornamentation resembling the law is engraved on its body. Swear on the alliance, glory shall come!
A Heavyblade that hosts the collective will. Wherever it passes, it manifests an unbreakable power of unity.
Autumn Carving: Flowing Wishes

Increases ATK by {2}%. Each time you deal damage to a target, a stack is accumulated for 5 seconds, 10 stacks max.. Only 1 stack every 0.4 seconds. Each stack increases ATK by {0}%. When there are 10 stacks, ATK is increased by an additional {1}%.
Weapon
A blade born of service to the law. Ornamentation resembling the law is engraved on its body. It bears the supreme will of its user.
A blade born of service to the law. Ornamentation resembling the law is engraved on its body. It bears the supreme will of its user.

Autumn Carving: Rain Chasing

DMG of all attributes are raised by {0}%. When normal attacks land, ATK and DEF are raised by {1}%, which lasts for {2} seconds. This can be stacked for max. {3} times and triggered once every {4} seconds.
Weapon
A Pistol specially made for crime sanction. Its historic users are all extraordinarily faithful to justice. Maybe... weapons pick their users, in their way.

Increase ATK by {0}%. Increase Crit DMG by {1}% when triggering Crit DMG. This effect can stack 3 times and last for 5s. This effect will lose 1 stack when duration ends.
Weapon

In the tradition of Huanglong, Ginkgo is the wood of 5 virtues. This Gauntlet was named after one of the virtue, ideal. It's forged in the style of particle, just as firm and strong mind of Huanglong's will.
